newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Belgian police seek scandal suspect.
newsitem.headline: Belgian police seek scandal suspect.

text.p: Police have issued an arrest warrant against a former policeman who was quizzed earlier this month in Belgium's child kidnapping, rape, murder and car theft scandal, the Belga news agency reported late on Monday.
It said investigating magistrate Jean Connerotte had asked police to detain Gerard Vannesse, a member of the para-military gendarmarie who was suspended for disciplinary reasons.

Vanesse was detained and questioned in early September over inquiries into drug trafficking with Jean-Michel Nihoul, a chief suspect in the murder of four abducted girls which has scandalised the country.
